column2: Sanitizing an HTTP request parameter may be ineffective if the user controls its type.
column4: Potential type confusion as [["this HTTP request parameter"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-843/examples/TypeConfusionThroughParameterTampering.js:5:14:5:30"]] may be either an array or a string.
